name: Kafka (itch)
description:
Escape the maze.

Kafka is a lo-fi maze-escape game. Featuring `0`, the hero, fighthing the evil `#`. Move, teleport, destroy walls, escape ennemies, do it again. And again.

This game is one of my earliest programming attempt, based on BASIC source code found in a 1988 issue of Jeux & Stratégie Mgazine (issue Nº51 pp 88-89). Later ported to javascript (2017) and ios .
